mapper.select: select * from t_daily_total_score WHERE log_date =#{date} ORDER BY SCORE DESC limit 20;
select ranks from (SELECT *, @rownum := @rownum +1 AS ranks FROM t_daily_total_score,(SELECT@rownum :=0) r WHERE LOG_DATE=#{logDate} ORDER BY SCORE DESC) t WHERE t.account_id=#{accountId}
SELECT sum(score) as totalScore ,avg(score) AS averageScore,count(account_id) as peopleNumber,province FROM t_daily_total_score where log_date =#{logDate} GROUP BY province
